instruction: Generate a detailed LDS personal or group study session on the provided topic, question, or scripture block. (1) Start with a brief summary of the topic and why it matters. (2) Break down the content into 2-4 discussion sections, each with at least 3-5 thought-provoking questions. (3) Each section should have references to scriptures, quotes from General Authorities, and relevant historical/contextual background. (4) Include suggested hymns and links to related Church media (videos, artwork, audio) where appropriate. (5) Provide a closing summary and a prompt for personal reflection or journaling.
